title: S16 Ep117: Demons w/Joseph Stewart
itunes:title: Demons w/Joseph Stewart
description:
Darkness Radio presents Demons with guest Joseph Stewart

Dave & Tim face the reality that Demons are real; they roam our world looking for opportunities to heap destruction upon us. They are ruled by blind hatred toward humanity, and they don't discriminate. Man, woman, or child—all are fair game. 

Today we journey into the realm of these horrific creatures with a real demon hunter, Joseph Stewart, to see the intense carnage unleashed on an unsuspecting public.

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3uAqDzo
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
